Package it.polimi.se2018.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PatternLoader
    Interface for pattern loaders.
    ToolCardBehaviour
    This interface represents the behavior of a tool card.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlterDieValueBehaviour
    This class manges the usage of the tool cards that alter the die value.
    AlterDieValueBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for AlterDieValueBehaviour.
    ArrayVarietyScore
    The class that contains a useful method for it's subclasses to see if all elements of an array of cells are different for a certain property.
    CardDealer
    This Class is used in the game's setup to deal the cards of each type in the right way according to the game's rules.
    CardDealerTest
    Adds tests for methods not tested by the controller test classes of the class CardDealer.
    ColumnVarietyScore
    The class to calculate the score related to the property of having all columns with different values for a certain property.
    ColumnVarietyScoreTest
    Unit tests for ColumnVarietyScore class.
    Controller
    Base abstract class for game controllers.
    ControllerTest
    The unit tests for Controller.
    DiagonalScore
    The class to calculate the score given by the dice which are diagonally adjacent for a certain property on the grid.
    DiagonalScoreTest
    Unit tests for DiagonalScore class.
    GridVarietyScore
    The class to calculate the score linked with the presence of a certain set of objects in the grid.
    GridVarietyScoreTest
    Unit tests for GridVarietyScore.
    MatchMaker
    Singleton used to link a view to a controller.
    MoveDiceBehaviour
    This class manages the usage of tool cards that move exactly n dice.
    MoveDiceBehaviourTest  
    MoveSomeDiceBehaviour
    This class manages the usage of tool cards that move up to 2 dices of the same colour of a die in the round track.
    MoveSomeDiceBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for MoveSomeDiceBehaviour class.
    MultiPlayerController
    The controller for the MultiPlayer configuration.
    MultiPlayerControllerTest
    The unit tests for MultiPlayerController.
    PlaceDieBehaviour
    This class manages the usage of tool cards that directly place a die.
    PlaceDieBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for PlaceDieBehaviour.
    PrivateObjectiveFactory
    A factory to create the PrivateObjectiveCards that will be used during the game.
    PrivateObjectiveFactoryTest
    Unit tests for PrivateObjectiveFactory class.
    PrivateObjectiveScore
    The class to calculate the score given by the PrivateObjectiveCard to the player at the end of the game.
    PrivateObjectiveScoreTest  
    PublicObjectiveElements
    The class containing the PublicObjectiveCards of the game and the corresponding PublicObjectiveScores to set i the controller.
    PublicObjectiveScore
    The abstract class to calculate the score related to a single PublicObjectiveCard.
    PullAgainAndPlaceBehaviour
    This class manages the usage of tool cards that puts a die back in the dice bag and pulls a new one, allowing the player to select the value before placing it.
    PullAgainAndPlaceBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for PullAgainAndPlaceBehaviour class.
    ReRollDieBehaviour
    This class manages the usage of tool cards that re-rolls a die.
    ReRollDieBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for ReRollDieBehaviour class.
    ReRollDraftPoolBehaviour
    This class manages the usage of tool cards that re-rolls all dice in the draft pool.
    ReRollDraftPoolBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for ReRollDraftPoolBehaviour class.
    RowVarietyScore
    The class to calculate the score related to the property of having all rows with different values for a certain property (value or colour).
    RowVarietyScoreTest
    Unit tests for the class RowVarietyScore.
    SaxPatternBuilder
    This class is a sax handler that parses a pattern from its xml description.
    SaxPublicObjectiveBuilder
    The sax parser for the xml files that describe public objective cards.
    SaxToolCardParser
    The class that parses an xml file that describes a ToolCard.
    SinglePlayerController
    This class extends the abstract Controller class and implements those behaviors that are different in Single Player from MultiPlayer mode: the main differences are in the management of the connection/reconnection of the Player, in the game's setting up, in the ToolCard's usage and in the end game scoring.
    SinglePlayerControllerTest
    Class to test the class SinglePlayerController in the package 'controller'.
    SwapDiceBehaviour
    This class manages the usage of tool cards that swap a die from the draft pool with one from the round track.
    SwapDiceBehaviourTest
    Unit tests for SwapDiceBehaviour class.
    ToolCardFactory
    This is a factory class for ToolCard.
    ToolCardFactoryTest
    Tests for ToolCardFactory.
    XmlCardLoader
    The class extends the XmlLoader adding functionalities linked with the loading of a specific list of cards.
    XmlPatternLoader
    This class allows to load pattern cards from xml files contained in a directory.
    XmlPatternLoaderTest
    Unit tests for XmlPatternLoader.
    XmlPublicObjectiveLoader
    The class to load files from the directory 'resources/public_objective_cards'.
    XmlPublicObjectiveLoaderTest
    Test for XmlPublicObjectiveLoader.
    XmlToolCardLoader
    The class that loads all ToolCards and creates the ToolCardFactory.
    XmlToolCardLoaderTest
    Unit tests for XmlToolCardLoader.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ToolCardBehaviourResponse
    Enum that represents the response of the application of a tool card behaviour to a game.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
